n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] % 2 == 0:
        ans += 1
        a[i] /= 2

print(ans)

N = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(N):
    while a[i] % 2 == 0:
        a[i] //= 2
        ans += 1

print(ans)

        a[i] //= 2
